resources.string: The apps are cleverly disguised to look normal, and pose as games, prank apps, code scanners and photo editors.
These apps quietly operate a type of scam known as ad fraud, according to cyber-experts, below is an example of the malicious code.
But they all contain a hidden secret: dodgy hacker code that\'s been branded \'Soraka\' by security experts.
Rogue Android apps hijack your phone and kill your battery life uninstall these offenders now
Press the search button to scan your device. A popup message will be shown if anything is found.
